page.title: 10WEDGWOOD FACTORY, BARLASTON
page.content: There are 6 weeks in a year when the employees have holidays. They also have a Sports and Social club, and there is canteen for them. A worker works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. from Monday to Thursday. On Friday they work from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. Sometimes they work overtime. There is a small twilight shift and a small night shift. Wedgwood is a public company. 80% of the workers come to work by car and the other 20% come by bus. The range of the price of a plate is from 4 pounds to 200 pounds. The most popular pattern is Cavendish.
